34 class GazeboRetrieve{
35 
36  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
37  image_transport::ImageTransport it_;
38  image_transport::Publisher image_pub_;
39  ros::Subscriber sub1_;

41  image_transport::Subscriber sub3_;

43  ros::ServiceServer service_;

45  int count_;
46  double resolution_;

48  struct DataBuffer
49  {
50  std::deque<geometry_msgs::Pose> poseDeq;
51  std::deque<ros::Time> timeStampDeq;
52  std::mutex buffer_mutex_;
53  };
54  DataBuffer buffer;
55 
56  struct ImageDataBuffer
57  {
58  std::deque<cv::Mat> imageDeq;
59  std::deque<ros::Time> timeStampDeq;
60  std::mutex buffer_mutex_;
61  };
62  ImageDataBuffer imageBuffer;
63 
64 
65 public:
66  GazeboRetrieve(ros::NodeHandle nh)
67  : nh_(nh), it_(nh)
68  {
69  sub1_ = nh_.subscribe("odom", 1000, &GazeboRetrieve::odomCallback,this);
70  sub2_ = nh_.subscribe("scan", 10, &GazeboRetrieve::laserCallback,this);
71  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
72  sub3_ = it.subscribe("map_image/full", 1, &GazeboRetrieve::imageCallback,this);
73 
74  //Publishing an image ... just to show how
75  image_pub_ = it_.advertise("test/image", 1);
76 
77  //Allowing an incoming service
78  service_ = nh_.advertiseService("request_goal", &GazeboRetrieve::requestGoal,this);
79 
80  //Below is how to get parameters from command line, on command line they need to be _param:=value
81  ros::NodeHandle pn("~");
82  double mapSize;
83  double resolution;
84  pn.param<double>("map_size", mapSize, 20.0);
85  pn.param<double>("resolution", resolution_, 0.1);
86 
87  count_ =0;
88  cv::namedWindow("view",CV_WINDOW_NORMAL);
89  cv::startWindowThread();
90  cv::waitKey(5);
91 
92  }
93 
94  ~GazeboRetrieve()
95  {
96  cv::destroyWindow("view");
97  }
98 
99 
100  bool requestGoal(a3_help::RequestGoal::Request &req,
101  a3_help::RequestGoal::Response &res)
102  {
103  ROS_INFO("request: x=%ld, y=%ld", (long int)req.x, (long int)req.y);
104  res.ack = true;
105  ROS_INFO("sending back response: [%d]", res.ack);
106  return true;
107  }
108 
109  void odomCallback(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr& msg)
110  {
111  //Let's get the pose out from odometry message
112  // REMEBER: on command line you can view entier msg as
113  //rosmsg show nav_msgs/Odometry
114  geometry_msgs::Pose pose=msg->pose.pose;
115  buffer.buffer_mutex_.lock();
116  buffer.poseDeq.push_back(pose);
117  buffer.timeStampDeq.push_back(msg->header.stamp);
118  buffer.buffer_mutex_.unlock();
119 
120  }
121 
122 
123 
124  void laserCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr& msg)
125  {
127  double closest_point=msg->range_max;
128  double angle=0;
129  double x,y;
130  for (unsigned int idx=0 ; idx < msg->ranges.size() ; idx++){
131  if(msg->ranges.at(idx)<closest_point){
132  closest_point=msg->ranges.at(idx);
133  angle=msg->angle_min+(idx*msg->angle_increment);
134  }
135  }
136  ros::Time timeLaser = msg->header.stamp;
137  x = closest_point * cos(angle);
138  y = closest_point * sin(angle);
139  std::cout << timeLaser << " L: [d,theta,x,y]=[" << closest_point << "," << angle << "," << x << "," << y << "]" << std::endl;
140  }
141 
142  void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
143  {
145  try
146  {
147  if (enc::isColor(msg->encoding))
148  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::BGR8);
149  else
150  cvPtr_ = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, enc::MONO8);
151  }
152  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
153  {
154  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
155  return;
156  }
157 
158  imageBuffer.buffer_mutex_.lock();
159  imageBuffer.imageDeq.push_back(cvPtr_->image);
160  imageBuffer.timeStampDeq.push_back(msg->header.stamp);
161  if(imageBuffer.imageDeq.size()>2){
162  imageBuffer.imageDeq.pop_front();
163  imageBuffer.timeStampDeq.pop_front();
164  }
165  imageBuffer.buffer_mutex_.unlock();
166 
167  }
168 
169 
170  void seperateThread() {
180  double yaw,x,y;
182  ros::Time timeOdom = ros::Time::now();;
183  ros::Time timeImage = ros::Time::now();;
184  cv::Mat image;
185 
186 
187  while (ros::ok()) {
188  int deqSz =-1;
189 
190  buffer.buffer_mutex_.lock();
191  deqSz = buffer.poseDeq.size();
192  if (deqSz > 0) {
193  geometry_msgs::Pose pose=buffer.poseDeq.front();
194  yaw = tf::getYaw(pose.orientation);
195  x = pose.position.x;
196  y = pose.position.y;
197  timeOdom = buffer.timeStampDeq.front();
198  buffer.poseDeq.pop_front();
199  buffer.timeStampDeq.pop_front();
200  }
201  buffer.buffer_mutex_.unlock();
202 
204  imageBuffer.buffer_mutex_.lock();
205  if(imageBuffer.imageDeq.size()>0){
206  image = imageBuffer.imageDeq.front();
207  timeImage = imageBuffer.timeStampDeq.front();
208  imageBuffer.imageDeq.pop_front();
209  imageBuffer.timeStampDeq.pop_front();
210  }
211  imageBuffer.buffer_mutex_.unlock();
212 
213  //Let's do something with the incoming ogMap now;
214  //on every 100 iterations
215  if (count_>100){
216  count_=0;
217  if(!image.empty()){
218  cv::Mat rgbImage;
219  cv::cvtColor(image,rgbImage,CV_GRAY2RGB);
220  if (image.rows > 60 && image.cols > 60)
221  //cv::circle(rgbImage, cv::Point((x/resolution_)+(image.rows/2), (y/resolution_)+(image.cols/2)), 7, CV_RGB(255,0,0),-1);
222  cv::circle(rgbImage, cv::Point((image.rows/2), (image.cols/2)), 7, CV_RGB(0,0,255),-1);
223  std::cout << timeOdom << " O: [x,y,yaw]=[" <<
224  x << "," << y << "," << yaw << "]" << std::endl;
225  std::cout << " pos [x,y]=[" << (x/resolution_) << "," << (y/resolution_) << "] " <<
226  " pos [x,y]=[" << (x/resolution_)+(image.rows/2) << "," << (y/resolution_)+(image.cols/2) << "]"<< std::endl;
227 
228  // Update GUI Window
229  cv::imshow("view", image);
230  cv::waitKey(5);
231 
232  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "rgb8", rgbImage).toImageMsg();
233  image_pub_.publish(msg);
234 
235  }
236  }
237  else{
238  count_++;
239  // This delay slows the loop down for the sake of readability
240  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(10));
241  }
242  }
243  }
244 
245 };
246 
247 
248 int main(int argc, char **argv)
249 {
250 
251 
262  ros::init(argc, argv, "gazebo_retrieve");
263 
269  ros::NodeHandle nh;
270 
275  std::shared_ptr<GazeboRetrieve> gc(new GazeboRetrieve(nh));
276  std::thread t(&GazeboRetrieve::seperateThread,gc);
277 
283  ros::spin();
284 
288  ros::shutdown();
289  t.join();
290 
291  return 0;
292 }
